segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing left, towel in hand on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, forming a puddle below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are typical for the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above reveals a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, cabinet doors are swung open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits inside, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a two-step stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, legs spread out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical domestic scene with minor issues.
segments.speaker: PAR
